explains: n. 合金；（与贵金属混合的）劣等金属
v. 把（金属）铸成合金；<文>损坏，使（价值）降低
wordGroup: shape memory alloy 形状记忆合金
low alloy steel 低合金钢
alloy powder 合金粉末；铝金粉末
amorphous alloy 非晶态合金，无定形合金
alloy casting n. 合金铸件，合金铸造
alloy wire 合金线；合金钢丝

sentences.en: Brass is an alloy of copper and zinc.
Bronze is an alloy of copper and tin.
The latest model features alloy wheels and an electronic alarm.
sentences.cn: 最新款式的特色是合金车轮和电子报警器。
